reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: We were initially pleased when we had these three switches installed by an electrician during a remodel. They worked well and looked great. But starting on day two a different switch broke down on each of the next three days, loosing their clicks and requiring multiple attempts to actually turn the lights on. After about a week, the dimmers all failed as well. All three switches had died within a week! These things *can* happen sometimes, and they say they will replace them. However, they do not respond to customer service e-mail, and the phone number eventually goes to some guy's voicemail with a promise to return your call. After a month of no response, I just cut my losses and ordered Lutrons, which I installed all together in about 30 minutes. From the beginning, they have worked far better as dimmers and they turn the light on every time. I hope that my learning this lesson about Bestten means that you don't have to.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.title: Save Your Money

I did end up using standard cover plates instead of the super modern looking ones that come with this dimmer but other than that it all worked out perfectly. reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: Update: Now these rate as a 1 Star. Besides the issues we previously mentioned, now two of them have failed completely. Internal switch mechanism broke and these are not in a high usage location. Absolute cheap China garbage! Dimmers on these are very poor. Tried on several different LED lights. Almost full bright or gill dim. Getting anything subtle in-between is impossible and tried various adjustments with the internal dimming thumb wheel. Sliders just don’t have very good dimming range. Would have returned these but were the only ones that closely matched existing dimmers in our home.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on May 13, 2023
reviews.title: Totally Disappointed now

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: With LED recessed dimmable downlights these flicker really bad. Any amount of adjusting of the sensitivity dial doesn't correct it. And with multi-gang installation, braking off the extra aluminium sides takes too much effort! I've done the same on other switches many times, and a few wiggles would break these off easily. Not with this product! I had to struggle and bend the whole box for 5 min. before I was able to separate the side. I've wasted more than an hour installing two of these dimmers in 2 separate sets of my kitchen lights and now I can pretty much only use them with really bright settings. Any dimming of less then 50% brightness will introduce random flickers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on October 10, 2022
reviews.title: Flickers badly with LED dimmable recessed lights

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: Avec le bouton d'ajustement pour les caprices des différents LED, c'est vraiment un produit intéressant.

reviews.title: Produit intéressant

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought three of these as I liked the design but now that I have installed them the LEDs flicker every 30 seconds to 5 minutes. I even switched the circuit it was connected to just incase there was interference on the line. I have it now on circuit with very little other devices. The flickering also happens on two separate light runs (as seen in the video) so it is not related to LEDs themselves. I am under the wattage and the flicker happens as low or high dimming settings. Unfortunately, I did not get them installed before the return date. I am going to have to replace them with a different dimmer, I am sure they work on some LEDs but really not the quality I expect.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on July 24, 2022
reviews.title: Flickers with LEDs

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: These are easy to install -- without requiring any special skills or extra room in the switch box. All the screws are firmly attached and it feels like a really high quality. I wish I had these for all my dimmers they look fabulous, adjust easily, and feel smooth and crisp in operation.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on June 11, 2022
reviews.title: Operates smoothly and feels solid

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: Unfortunately this dimmer did not work for me. I install 2 single pole and 1 three way next to each other in a 3 gang box. The 3 way controlled 6 LED MR16 lamps through an electronic transformer and the single poles controlled 1 lamp and 2 lamps also through an electronic transformer. In spite of the adjustable thumb wheel position, the lamps flickered in all levels. There is also some cross-talk going on between the dimmers, adjustments made to one would also affect the others. Perhaps they may work better in an application that does not include electronic transformers or drivers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on October 28, 2021
reviews.title: They may work for you... not for me!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: Only got around to installing it after the return window closed. It flickers like crazy it gave my little brother a seizure (I’m serious). One second doesn’t go by where it does not stop flickering it’s a like disco. Cheapest dimmers on the market - don’t buy
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on September 14, 2021
reviews.title: Cheapest dimmers on the market

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 3 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Light Switch for Incandescent or Halogen Bulbs, CFL and LED Lamps, White
reviews.text: 1st installation was on normal lights, the switch was doing a noise while the dimmer was active. The sound was not perceptible at full light. I installed a 2nd one a group of 6 LED in ceiling. 1st problem...the sound like if there was a huge amount of flies hiding behind the switch. 2nd problem the it would only apply 15% of light reduction before the switch would simply stop working. For example, at 25%+ of light reduction If I would turn the off the light I couldn't turn it back on unless I would bring back the dimmer to 15%. On a 3 way, it is extremely annoying and if defeats the purpose since we always have to go back to the dimmer switch. I spent over an hour playing with the adjustments to try to find a solution, to the 2 problems...found none. I'm sending back these products.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on February 7, 2021
reviews.title: Ordered 3, gave up after 2 installations
